name: [Browser Version]Ayyy Leon - An Eggistential Crisis (prototype)
description:
WASD or Arrows to move, Space to interact

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/ayy-leon-an-eggistential-crisis

My submission for Ludum Dare 47 and my first released game!  The theme of the Jam was "Stuck in a Loop".

It's pretty rough, but I'm happy I got it to a playable state.
